Articles.Content:
Hi

Is anyone good at 3-D rendering software, particularly for ships (the water kind, not the space kind)? I have a modern batteship design on paper/description and a general layout sketch (MS Paint ), I have tried using Delfship but any kind of 3-d software of any kind is way too complex for me.

If you are good at this sort of thing, would you mind modelling it? I would be extremely grateful
